title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the content as expected when different types of content are present in the database field. The issue specifically occurs when the content falls into one of the following types:1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags.3) Text with RTF tags.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:1. Have a database field with the three types of content mentioned above.2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of the field.3. Observe that the dynamic text element does not correctly handle and display the different content types.
